title: Products
text: About Roshen Products ROSHEN product line includes chocolates and jelly sweets, caramel, toffee, chocolate bars, biscuits, wafers, sponge cakes, marshmallow, marmalade, and cakes. ROSHEN product line includes chocolates and jelly sweets, caramel, toffee, chocolate bars, biscuits, wafers, sponge cakes, marshmallow, marmalade, and cakes. In its production ROSHEN uses the highest quality ingredients that we import from different corners of the globe, and our own unique recipes paired with the latest technology allow us to produce the finest products
